summary: THE BRAKE  DISC KEEPS WARPING. CONSUMER HAS TO REPLACE THEM EVERY 12/14 THOUSAND MILES.  THE DEALERSHIP HAS REPLACED ROTORS 3 TIMES AND TURN THEM TWICE, BUT PROBLEM THIS RECURRED. TS  BRAKES PULSATED AT 12,374, 17,770, 18,856, 34,526, 38,960 AND 52,459 MILES.  ROTORS REPLACED 4 TIMES.  THERE WAS ALSO A  MISS AT IDLE AND IN PARK.  DEALER UNABLE TO VERIFY.   *TT
